name: billowy

appearing large and soft or filled with air: a blue June sky filled with billowy white clouds They draped the set in billowy satin fabric.
More examplesFewer examplesHe had a red, billowy scarf wrapped around his head.She was unrecognisable in a billowy nun's habit and a stiff bonnet.She was dressed in an abaya, a kind of billowy cloak.Billowy white cascades of snow blew around us.The buildings somehow appear soft and billowy, like folds of drapery or a woman's body.
